title: Adobe Media Encoder 2022 22.2 – Included with Adobe Premier CC
content: Adobe Media Encoder software automates the process of creating multiple encoded versions of source files, Adobe Premiere Pro sequences, and Adobe After Effects compositions. An intuitive interface, background encoding, and convenient presets help you quickly output for virtually any screen. title: Growing Up 1.2.3928 – Experience the entire journey from toddler to adulthood

title: Prison Architect 8419 – Build and Manage A Maximum Security Prison
content: Build and manage a Maximum Security Prison. As the sun casts it’s early morning rays on a beautiful patch of countryside the clock starts ticking. You’ve got to crack on and build a holding cell to detain the job­ lot of maximum security prisoners that are trundling to your future prison on their yellow bus. […]

title: Mini Metro 50 – Design the subway layout for a rapidly expanding city
content: In Mini Metro, you take on the task of designing the subway layout for a rapidly expanding city. Your city starts with three stations. Draw routes between these stations to connect them with subway lines. Commuters travel along your lines to get around the city as fast as they can. Each station can only hold […]

title: For The King 1.1.00.113378 – A strategic RPG turn-based game
content: The King is dead, murdered by an unknown assailant. Now the once peaceful kingdom of Fahrul is in chaos.   With nowhere left to turn and stretched beyond her means, the queen has put out a desperate plea to the citizens of the land to rise up and help stem the tide of impending doom. […]

title: SOMA 1.64 – A sci-fi horror game from Frictional Games
content: SOMA is a sci-fi horror game from Frictional Games, the creators of Amnesia: The Dark Descent. It is an unsettling story about identity, consciousness, and what it means to be human.   The radio is dead, food is running out, and the machines have started to think they are people.
